title: Pool Party Team Needed
body:
Hi guys i am a level 12 Summoner and i would like to join  a team who are in and around my level. Doing ARAM also.

My in Game Name is :-  Tobacco Kills

Send me Friend Requests please. Thanks in advance
{{champion:103}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:19}}

replies.body: dnt have a team but ill join if u make one. Aladdin
